column4: i need to upgrade subversion to 1.5. apt-get install subversion' says
* i need to upgrade subversion to 1.5. apt-get 'install subversion' says it is already up to date iwth newest version. Though installed version is 1.4. Any ideas?
Wouldn't it just be 'apt-get update subversion'
No, update is different. it doesn't take any param
